introduction.title: Rhythmic Strumming
introduction.concept-1: Now that you've mastered the left hand with chord fingering, it's time to move on to the right hand's role.
introduction.concept-2: The right hand on guitar fulfills the role of performing rhythmic strumming and arpeggios.
introduction.concept-3: Rhythmic strumming is the name given to sequences of movements in the right hand (or the opposite hand to where you finger chords).

get-start.title: Before we begin the action, we need to understand some concepts.
get-start.concept-1: During this module, we will use numerical representations or letters of your fingers. They are represented as follows:
